GV05agsas_4u:2: tasyaitatyāgamārthasyādvaitadarśanasya pratipakṣabhūtā dvaitino vaināśikāśca teṣāṃ cānyonyavirodādrāgadveṣādikleśāspadaṃ darśanamiti mithyādarśanatvaṃ sūcitam /
GV05agsas_4u:10: jñeyābhinnena saṃbuddhas taṃ vande dvipadāṃ varam // MandUpK_4.1 //
GV05agsas_4u:15: dharmānātmanaḥ, kiṃviśiṣṭāngaganopamāngaganamupamā yeṣāṃ te gaganopamāstānātmano dharmān /
GV05agsas_4u:16_1: jñānaṃ tena jñeyābhinnena jñānenākāśakalpena jñeyātmasvarūpāvyatiriktena gaganopamāndharmānyaḥ
GV05agsas_4u:17: ayameveśvaro yo nārāyaṇākhyastaṃ vande 'bhivādaye dvipadāṃ varaṃ dvipadopalakṣitānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ varaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣottamamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:18: upadeṣṭṛnamaskāramukhena jñānajñeyajñātṛbhedarahitaṃ paramārthadarśanamiha prakaraṇe pratipipādayiṣitaṃ pratipakṣapratiṣedhadvāreṇa pratijñātaṃ bhavati //1//
GV05agsas_4u:23: avivādo 'viruddhaś ca deśitas taṃ namāmy aham // MandUpK_4.2 //
GV05agsas_4u:26: sparśanaṃ sparśaḥ sambandho na vidyate yasya yogasya kenacitkadācidapi sa asparśayogo brahmasvabhāva eva,
GV05agsas_4u:32_0: tatheha bhavati kaścidviṣayopabhogaḥ sukho na hito 'yaṃ tu sukho hitaśca nityamapracalitasvabhāvatvāt
GV05agsas_4u:32_1: kiṃ cāvivādo viruddha vadanaṃ vivādaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraheṇa yasminna vidyate sa avivādaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:34: ya īdṛśo yogo deśita upadiṣṭaḥ śāstreṇa taṃ namāmyahaṃ praṇamāmītyarthaḥ //2//
GV05agsas_4u:38: bhūtasya jātim icchanti vādinaḥ kecid eva hi /
GV05agsas_4u:42: bhūtasya vidyamānasya vastuno jātimutpattimicchanti vādinaḥ kecideva hi sāṃkhyā na sarvaṃ eva dvaitinaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:43: yasmādabhūtasyāvidyamānasyāpare vaiśeṣikā naiyāyikāśca dhīrā dhīmantaḥ prajñābhimānina ityartho vivadanto viruddhaṃ vadanto hyanyenyamicchanti jetumityabhiprāyaḥ //3//
GV05agsas_4u:46: tairevaṃ viruddhavadanenānyonyapakṣapratiṣedhaṃ kurvadbhiḥ kiṃ khyāpitaṃ bhavatyucyate-
GV05agsas_4u:47: bhūtaṃ na jāyate kiñcid abhūtaṃ naiva jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:48: vivadanto 'dvayā hy evam ajātiṃ khyāpayanti te // MandUpK_4.4 //
GV05agsas_4u:51: bhūtaṃ vidyamānaṃ vastu na jāyate kiñcidvidyamānatvādevātmavadityevaṃ vadannasadvādī sāṃkhyapakṣaṃ pratiṣedhati sajjanma /
GV05agsas_4u:53: vivadanto viruddhaṃ vadanto 'dvayā advaitino hyete 'nyonyasya pakṣau sadasatorjanmanī pratiṣedhanto 'jātimanutpattimarthātkhyāpayanti prakāśayanti te //4//
GV05agsas_4u:57: vivadāmo na taiḥ sārdham avivādaṃ nibodhata // MandUpK_4.5 //
GV05agsas_4u:60: tairevaṃ khyāpyamānāmajātimevamastvityanumodāmahe kevalaṃ na taiḥ sārdhaṃ vivadāmaḥ pakṣapratipakṣagrahaṇena;
GV05agsas_4u:66: ajāto hy amṛto dharmo martyatāṃ katham eṣyati // MandUpK_4.6 //
GV05agsas_4u:72: na bhavaty amṛtaṃ martyaṃ na martyam amṛtaṃ tathā /
GV05agsas_4u:73: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.7 //
GV05agsas_4u:75: kṛtakenāmṛtas tasya kathaṃ sthāsyati niścalaḥ // MandUpK_4.8 //
GV05agsas_4u:82: sāṃsiddhikī svābhāvikī sahajā akṛtā ca yā /
GV05agsas_4u:83: prakṛtiḥ seti vijñeyā svabhāvaṃ na jahāti yā // MandUpK_4.9 //
GV05agsas_4u:86: samyaksiddhiḥ saṃsiddhistatra bhavā sāṃsiddhikī yathā yogināṃ siddhānām aṇimādyaiśvaryaprāptiḥ prakṛtiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:87: sā bhūtabhaviṣyatkālayorapi yogināṃ na viparyeti tathaiva sā /
GV05agsas_4u:88: tathā svābhāvikī dravyasvabhāvata eva yathāgnyādīnām uṣṇaprakāśādilakṣaṇā,
GV05agsas_4u:89: sāpi na kālāntare vyabhicarati deśāntare ca /
GV05agsas_4u:90: tathā sahajā ātmanā sahaiva jātā yathā pakṣyādīnāmākāśagamanādilakṣaṇā /
GV05agsas_4u:91: anyāpi yā kācidakṛtā kenacinna kṛtā yatāpāṃ nimnadeśagamanādilakṣaṇā /
GV05agsas_4u:92: anyāpi yā kājitsvabhāvaṃ na jahāti sā sarvā prakṛtiriti vijñeyā loke /
GV05agsas_4u:93: mithyākalpiteṣu laukikeṣvapi vastuṣu prakṛtirnānyathā bhavati kimutājasvabhāveṣu paramārthavastuṣvamṛtatvalakṣaṇā prakṛtirnānyathā bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ //9//
GV05agsas_4u:96: kiṃviṣayā punaḥ sā prakṛtiryasyā anyathābhāvo vādibhiḥ kalpyate kalpanāyāṃ vā ko doṣa ityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:102: ke ? sarve dharmāḥ sarva ātmāna ityetatsvabhāvataḥ prakṛtitaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:103: evaṃsvabhāvāḥ santo dharmājarāmaraṇamicchanta icchanta ivecchantorajjvāmiva sarpamātmani kalpayantaścyavante svabhāvataścalantītyarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:108: kāraṇaṃ yasya vai kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ tasya jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:109: jāyamānaṃ katham ajaṃ bhinnaṃ nityaṃ kathaṃ ca tat // MandUpK_4.11 //
GV05agsas_4u:112: kāraṇaṃ mṛdvadupādānalakṣaṇaṃ yasya vādino vai kāryaṃ kāraṇameva kāryākāreṇa pariṇamate yasya vādina ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:113: tasyājameva satprādhānādi kāraṇaṃ mahadādikāryarūpeṇa jāyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:114: mahadādyākāreṇa cejjāyamānaṃ pradhānaṃ kathamajamucyate tairvipratiṣiddhaṃ cedaṃ jāyate 'jaṃ ceti /
GV05agsas_4u:115: nityaṃ ca tairucyate pradhānaṃ bhinnaṃ vidīrṇaṃ sphuṭitamekadeśena satkathaṃ nityaṃ bhavedityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:116: na hi sāvayavaṃ ghaṭādy ekadeśasphuṭanadharmi nityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ loka ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:117: vidīrṇaṃ ca syādekadeśenājaṃ nityaṃ cety etadvipratiṣiddhaṃ tairabhidhīyata ityabhiprāyaḥ //11//
GV05agsas_4u:121: kāraṇād yady ananyatvam ataḥ kāryam ajaṃ yadi /
GV05agsas_4u:122: jāyamānād dhi vai kāryāt kāraṇaṃ te kathaṃ dhruvam // MandUpK_4.12 //
GV05agsas_4u:125: kāraṇādajātkāryasya yadyananyatvamiṣṭaṃ tvayā tataḥ kāryamajamiti prāptam /
GV05agsas_4u:127: kiṃ cānyatkāryakāraṇayonanyatve jāyamānāddhi vai kāryakāraṇamananyannityaṃ dhruvaṃ ca te kathaṃ bhavet /
GV05agsas_4u:128: na hi kukkuṭyā ekadeśaḥ pacyata ekadeśaḥ prasavāya kalpyate //12//
GV05agsas_4u:132: ajād vai jāyate yasya dṛṣṭāntas tasya nāsti vai /
GV05agsas_4u:133: jātāc ca jāyāmānasya na vyavasthā prasajyate // MandUpK_4.13 //
GV05agsas_4u:136: ajādanutpannādvastuno jāyate yasya vādinaḥ kāryaṃ dṛṣṭānttastasya nāsti vai,
GV05agsas_4u:138: yadā punarjātājjāyamānasya vastuno 'bhyupagamas tadapyanyasmāj jātāttadapyanyasmāditi na vyāvasthā prasajyate /
GV05agsas_4u:144: hetor ādiḥ phalaṃ yeṣām ādir hetuḥ phalasya ca /
GV05agsas_4u:145: hetoḥ phalasya cānādiḥ kathaṃ tair upavarṇyate // MandUpK_4.14 //
GV05agsas_4u:148: hetordharmāderādiḥ kāraṇaṃ dehādisaṃghātaḥ phalaṃ yeṣāṃ vādinām /
GV05agsas_4u:149: tathādiḥ kāraṇaṃ heturdharmādharmādiḥ phalasya ca dehādisaṃghātasya /
GV05agsas_4u:150: evaṃ hetuphalayoritaretarakāryakāraṇatvenādimattvaṃ bruvadbhirevaṃ hetoḥ phalasya cānāditvaṃ kathaṃ tairupavarṇyate?
GV05agsas_4u:152: na hi nityasya kūṭasthasyātmano hetuphalātmatā sambhavati //14//
GV05agsas_4u:156: hetor ādiḥ phalaṃ yeṣām ādir hetuḥ kalasya ca /
GV05agsas_4u:157: tathā janma bhavet teṣāṃ putrāj janma pitur yathā // MandUpK_4.15 //
GV05agsas_4u:160: hetujanyādeva phalāddhetorjanmābhyupagacchatāṃ teṣāmīdṛśo virodha ukto bhavati yathā putrājjanma pituḥ //15//
GV05agsas_4u:168: saṃbhave hetuphalayorutpattau krama eṣitavyastvayānyeṣṭavyo hetu ; pūrvaṃ paścātphalaṃ ceti /
GV05agsas_4u:174: phalād utpadyamānaḥ san na te hetuḥ prasidhyati /
GV05agsas_4u:175: aprasiddhaḥ kathaṃ hetuḥ phalam utpādayiṣyati // MandUpK_4.17 //
GV05agsas_4u:178: janyātsvato 'labdhātmakāt phalādutpadyamānaḥ sañśaśaviṣāṇāderivāsato na hetuḥ prasidhyati janma na labhate /
GV05agsas_4u:180: na hītaretarāpekṣasiddhyoḥ śaśaviṣāṇakalpayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena saṃbandhaḥ kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:184: yadi hetoḥ phalāt siddhiḥ phalasiddhiś ca hetutaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:185: katarat pūrvaniṣpannaṃ yasya siddhir apekṣayā // MandUpK_4.18 //
GV05agsas_4u:188_1: eva tvayā kataratpūrvaniṣpannaṃ hetuphalayoryasya paścādbhāvinaḥ siddhiḥ syātpūrvasiddhyapekṣayā
GV05agsas_4u:193: evaṃ hi sarvathā buddhair ajātiḥ paridīpitā // MandUpK_4.19 //
GV05agsas_4u:197: atha vā yo 'yaṃ tvayoktaḥ kramo hetoḥ phalasya siddhiḥ phalācca hetoḥ siddhiritītaretarānantaryalakṣaṇastasya kopo viparyāso 'nyathābhāvaḥ syādityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:198: evaṃ hetuphalayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvānupapatterajātiḥ sarvasyānutpattiḥ paridīpitā prakāśitānyonyapakṣadoṣaṃ bruvadbhirvādibhirbuddhaiḥ paṇḍitairityarthaḥ //19//
GV05agsas_4u:201: nanu hetulayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāva ityasmābhiruktaṃ śabdamātramāśritya cchalamidaṃ tvayoktaṃ putrājjanma pituryathā,
GV05agsas_4u:206: bījāṅkurākhyo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sadā sādhyasamo hi sa /
GV05agsas_4u:207: na hi sādhyasamo hetuḥ siddhau sādhyasya yujyate // MandUpK_4.20 //
GV05agsas_4u:210: bījāṅkurākhyā dṛṣṭānto yaḥ sa sādhyena tulyo mametyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:214: evaṃ pūrvaḥ pūrvo 'ṅkuro bījaṃ ca pūrvaṃ pūrvamādimadeviti pratyekaṃ sarvasya bījāṅkurajātasyādimattvātkasyacidapyanāditvānupapatti /
GV05agsas_4u:217: na hi bījāṅkuravyatirekeṇa bījāṅkurasantatirnāmaikābhyupagamyate hetuphalasantatirvā tadanāditvavādibhis tasmātsūktaṃ hetoḥ phalasya cānādiḥ kathaṃ tairupavarṇyata iti /
GV05agsas_4u:219: na ca loke sādhyasamo hetuḥ sādhyasiddhau siddhinimittaṃ prayujyate pramāṇakuśalairityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:226: jāyamānād dhi vai dharmāt kathaṃ pūrvaṃ na gṛhyate // MandUpK_4.21 //
GV05agsas_4u:230: jāyamāno hi ceddharmo gṛhyate, kathaṃ tasmātpūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ na gṛhyate /
GV05agsas_4u:236: itaśca na jāyate kiñcit, yajjāyamānaṃ vastu-
GV05agsas_4u:237: svato vā parato vāpi na kiñcid vastu jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:238: sad asat sadasad vāpi na kiñcid vastu jāyate // MandUpK_4.22 //
GV05agsas_4u:241: svataḥ parata ubhayato vā sadasatsadasadvā na jāyate na tasya kenacidapi prakāreṇa janma saṃbhavati /
GV05agsas_4u:242: na tāvatsvayamevāpariniṣpannātsvataḥ svarūpātsvayameva jāyate yathā ghaṭastasmādeva ghaṭāt /
GV05agsas_4u:244: tathā nobhayataḥ, virodhāt; yathā ghaṭapaṭābhyāṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭo vā na jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:245: nanu mṛdo ghaṭo jāyate pituśca putraḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:246: satyam, asti jāyata iti pratyayaḥ śabdaśca mūḍhānām /
GV05agsas_4u:247: tāveva śabdapratyayau vivekibhiḥ parīkṣyete kiṃ satyameva tāvuta mṛṣeti /
GV05agsas_4u:248: yāvatā parīkṣyamāṇe śabdapratyaviṣayaṃ vastu ghaṭaputrādilakṣaṇaṃ śabdamātrameva tat /
GV05agsas_4u:253: ato na kiñcadvastu jāyata iti siddham /
GV05agsas_4u:254: yeṣāṃ punarjanireva jāyata iti kriyākārakaphalaikatvam abhyupagamyate kṣaṇikatvaṃ ca vastunaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:259: kiṃ ca hetuphalayoranāditvamabhyupagacchatā tvayā balāddhetuphalayorajanmaivābhyupagataṃ syāt /
GV05agsas_4u:261: hetur na jāyate 'nādeḥ phalaṃ cāpi svabhāvataḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:262: ādir na vidyate yasya tasya hy ādir na vidyate // MandUpK_4.23 //
GV05agsas_4u:267: phalaṃ cādirahitādanāderhetorajātsvabhāvata eva nirnimittaṃ jāyata iti nābhyupagamyate /
GV05agsas_4u:269: yasmādādiḥ kāraṇaṃ na vidyate yasya loke tasya hyādiḥ pūrvoktā jātirna vidyate /
GV05agsas_4u:279: nimittaṃ kāraṇaṃ viṣaya ityetatsannimittatvaṃ saviṣatvaṃ svātmavyatiriktaviṣayatetyetat pratijānīmahe /
GV05agsas_4u:280: na hi nirviṣayā prajñaptiḥ śabdādipratītiḥ syāt, tasyāḥ sanimittatvāt /
GV05agsas_4u:281: anyathā nirviṣayatve śabdasparśanīlapītalohitādipratyayavaicitryasya dvayasya nāśato nāśo 'bhāvaḥ prasajyetetyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:285: tasya paratantrasya paratantrāśrayasya bāhyārthasya jñānavyatiriktasyāsthitā matābhipretā /
GV05agsas_4u:286: na hi prajñapteḥ prakāśamātrasvarūpāyā nīlapītādibāhyālambanavaicitryamantareṇa svabhāvabhedenaiva vaicitryaṃ saṃbhavati /
GV05agsas_4u:287: sphaṭikasyeva nīlādyupādhyāśrayairvinā vaicitryaṃ na ghaṭata ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:291: yadyagnyādibāhyaṃ dāhādinimittaṃ vijñānavyatiriktaṃ na syāttato dāhādiduḥkhaṃ nopalabhyate /
GV05agsas_4u:294: na hi vijñānamātre saṃklośo yuktaḥ, anyatrādarśanādityabhiprāyaḥ //24//
GV05agsas_4u:308: na hi ghaṭo yathābhūtamṛdrūpadarśane sati tadvyatirekeṇāsti,
GV05agsas_4u:313: tadabhāve 'bhāvān na hi suṣuptasamāhitamuktānāṃ bhrāntidarśanābhāva ātmavyatirikto bāhyor'tha upalabhyate /
GV05agsas_4u:319: cittaṃ na saṃspṛśaty arthaṃ nārthābhāsaṃ tathaiva ca /
GV05agsas_4u:320: abhūto hi yataś cārtho nārthābhāsas tataḥ pṛthak // MandUpK_4.26 //
GV05agsas_4u:323: cittaṃ na spṛśatyarthaṃ bāhyālambanaviṣayam, nāpyarthābhāsaṃ cittatvātsvapnacittavat /
GV05agsas_4u:324: abhūto hi jāgarite 'pi svapnārthavadeva bāhyaḥ śabdādyartho yata uktahetutvācca /
GV05agsas_4u:331: nimittaṃ na sadā cittaṃ saṃspṛśaty adhvasu triṣu /
GV05agsas_4u:332: animitto viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ tasya bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.27 //
GV05agsas_4u:335: nimittaṃ viṣayamatītānāgatavartamānādhvasu triṣvapi sadā cittaṃ na spṛśedeva hi /
GV05agsas_4u:336: yadi hi kvacit saṃspṛśet sa aviparyāsaḥ paramārtha iti /
GV05agsas_4u:337: atastadapekṣayāsati ghaṭe ghaṭādyābhāsatā viparyāsaḥ syānna tu tadasti kadācidapi cittasyārthasaṃsparśanam /
GV05agsas_4u:338: tasmādanimitto viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ tasya cittasya bhaviṣyati; na kathañcidviparyāso 'stītyabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:339: ayameva hi svabhāvaścittasya yadutāsati nimitte ghaṭādau tadvadavabhāsanam //27//
GV05agsas_4u:344: tasmān na jāyate cittaṃ cittadṛśyaṃ na jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:345: tasya paśyanti ye jātiṃ khe vai paśyanti te padam // MandUpK_4.28 //
GV05agsas_4u:348: yasmādasatyeva ghaṭādau ghaṭādyābhāsatā cittasya vijñānavādinābhyupagatā tadanumoditam asmābhirapi bhūtadarśanāt,
GV05agsas_4u:349: tasmāttasyāpi cittasya jāyamānāvabhāsatāsatyeva janmani yuktā bhavitumityato na jāyate cittam,
GV05agsas_4u:351: atastasya cittasya ye jātiṃ paśyanti vijñānavādinaḥ kṣaṇikatvaduḥkhitvaśūnyatvānātmatvādi ca,
GV05agsas_4u:352: tenaiva cittena cittasvarūpaṃ draṣṭumaśakyaṃ paśyantaḥ khe vai paśyanti te padaṃ pakṣyādīnām /
GV05agsas_4u:353_0: ata itarebhyo 'pi dvaitibhyo 'tyantasāhasikā ityartho ye 'pi śūnyavādinaḥ paśyanta
GV05agsas_4u:353_1: eva sarvaśūnyatāṃ svadarśanasyāpi śūnyatāṃ svadarśanasyāpi śūnyatāṃ pratijānate te
GV05agsas_4u:356: uktairhetubhirajamekaṃ brahmeti siddhaṃ yatpunarādau pratijñātaṃ tatphalopasaṃhārārthoyaṃ ślokaḥ-
GV05agsas_4u:357: ajātaṃ jāyate yasmād ajātiḥ prakṛtis tataḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:358: prakṛter anyathābhāvo na kathañcid bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.29 //
GV05agsas_4u:361: ajātaṃ yaccittaṃ brahmaiva jāyata iti vādibhiḥ parikalpyate tadajātaṃ jāyate yasmādajātiḥ prakṛtistasya /
GV05agsas_4u:365: ayaṃ cāpara ātmanaḥ saṃsāramokṣayoḥ paramārthasadbhāvavādināṃ doṣa ucyate-
GV05agsas_4u:366: anāder antavattvaṃ ca saṃsārasya na setsyati /
GV05agsas_4u:367: anantatā cādimato mokṣasya na bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.30 //
GV05agsas_4u:370: anāderatītakoṭirahitasya saṃsārasyāntavattvaṃ samāptirna setsyati yuktitaḥ siddhiṃ nopayāsyati /
GV05agsas_4u:373: tathānantatāpi vijñānaprāptikālaprabhavasya mokṣasyādimato na bhaviṣyati, ghaṭādiṣvadarśanāt /
GV05agsas_4u:374: ghacādivināśavadavastutvādadoṣa iti cet, tathā ca mokṣasya paramārthasadbhāvapratijñāhāniḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:378: ādāvante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GV05agsas_4u:379: vitathaiḥ sadṛśāḥ santo 'vitathā iva lakṣitāḥ // MandUpK_4.31 //
GV05agsas_4u:381: tasmād ādyantavattvena mithyaiva khalu te smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_4.32 //
GV05agsas_4u:388: saṃvṛtte 'smin pradeśe vai bhūtānāṃ darśanaṃ kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.33 //
GV05agsas_4u:393: na yuktaṃ darśanaṃ gatvā kālasyāniyamād gatau /
GV05agsas_4u:394: pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvas tasmin deśe na vidyate // MandUpK_4.34 //
GV05agsas_4u:397: jāgarite gatyāgamanakālo niyato deśaḥ pramāṇato yastasyā niyamānniyamasyābhāvātsvapne na deśāntarāgamanamityarthaḥ //34//
GV05agsas_4u:400: mitrādyaiḥ saha saṃmantrya saṃbuddhau na prapadyate /
GV05agsas_4u:401: gṛhītaṃ cāpi yat kiñcit pratibuddho na paśyati // MandUpK_4.35 //
GV05agsas_4u:404: mitrādyaiḥ saha saṃmantrya tadeva mantraṇaṃ pratibuddhau na prapadyate /
GV05agsas_4u:409: svapne cāvastukaḥ kāyaḥ pṛthag anyasya darśanāt /
GV05agsas_4u:410: yathā kāyas tathā sarvaṃ cittadṛśyam avastukam // MandUpK_4.36 //
GV05agsas_4u:413: svapne cāṭandṛśyate yaḥ kāyaḥ sa avastukastato 'nyasya svāpadeśastasya pṛthakkāyāntarasya darśanāt /
GV05agsas_4u:414: yathā svapnadṛśyaḥ kāyo 'saṃstathā sarvaṃ cittadṛśyamavastukaṃ jāgarite 'pi cittadṛśyatvādityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:420: tad dhetutvāt tu tasyaiva sajjāgaritam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.37 //
GV05agsas_4u:423: jāgaritavajjāgaritasye7va grahaṇādgrāhyagrāhakarūpeṇāsvapnasya tajjāgaritaṃ heturasya svapnasya sa svapnastaddhetujāgaritakāryamiṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:424: taddhetutvājjāgaritakāryatvāttasyaiva svapnadṛśya eva sajjāgaritaṃ na tvanyeṣām /
GV05agsas_4u:426_0: yathā svapnaḥ svapnadṛśya eva sansādhāraṇavidyamānavastuvadavabhāsate tathā tatkāraṇatvātsādhāraṇavidyamānavastuvadavabhāsamānaṃ
GV05agsas_4u:430: atyantacalo hi svapno jāgaritaṃ tu sthiraṃ lakṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:432: vivekināṃ tu na kasyacidvastuna utpādaḥ prasiddhe 'taḥ-
GV05agsas_4u:434: na ca bhūtād abhūtasya saṃbhavo 'sti kathañcana // MandUpK_4.38 //
GV05agsas_4u:437: aprasiddhatvādutpādasyātmaiva sarvamityajaṃ sarvamudāhṛtaṃ vedānteṣu“sabāhyābhyantaro hyajaḥ“(mu.u.2 / 1 / 2) iti /
GV05agsas_4u:438: yadyapi manyase jāgaritāstato 'satsvapno jāyata iti tadasat /
GV05agsas_4u:440: na hyasataḥ śaśaviṣāṇādeḥ sambhavo dṛṣṭaḥ kathañcidapi //38//
GV05agsas_4u:443: nanūktaṃ tvayaiva svapno jāgaritakāryamiti tatkathamutpādo 'prasiddha ityucyate?
GV05agsas_4u:445: asaj jāgarite dṛṣṭvā svapne paśyati tanmayaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:446: asatsvapne 'pi dṛṣṭvā ca pratibuddhau na paśyati // MandUpK_4.39 //
GV05agsas_4u:449: asadavidyamānaṃ rajjusarpadvikalpitaṃ vastu jāgarite dṛṣṭvā tadbhāvabhāvitastanmayaḥ svapne 'pi jāgaritavadgrāhyagrāhakarūpeṇa vikalpayanpaśyati /
GV05agsas_4u:450: tathāsatsvapne 'pi dṛṣṭvā ca pratibuddhau na paśyatyavikalpayan /
GV05agsas_4u:451: ca śabdāttathā jāgarite 'pi dṛṣṭvā svapne na paśyati kadācidityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:452: tasmājjāgaritaṃ svapnaheturucyate na tu paramārthasaditi kṛtvā //39//
GV05agsas_4u:455: paramārthatastu na kasyacitkenacidapi prakāreṇa kāryakāraṇabhāva upapadyate katham?-
GV05agsas_4u:457: sac ca saddhetukaṃ nāsti saddhetukam asat kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.40 //
GV05agsas_4u:460: nāstyasaddhetukamasacchaśaviṣāṇādi hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ yasyāsata eva svakusumādestadasaddhatukamasanna vidyate /
GV05agsas_4u:461: tathā sadapi ghaṭādivastv asaddhetukaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādikāryaṃ nāsti /
GV05agsas_4u:462: tathā sacca vidyamānaṃ ghaṭādi vidyamānaghaṭādivastvantarakāryaṃ nāsti /
GV05agsas_4u:464: na cānyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambhavati śakyo vā kalpayitum?
GV05agsas_4u:465: ato vivekināmasiddha eva kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kasya cidityabhiprāyaḥ //40//
GV05agsas_4u:469: viparyāsād yathā jāgrad acintyān bhūtavat spṛśet /
GV05agsas_4u:470: tathā svapne viparyāsād dharmāṃs tatraiva paśyati // MandUpK_4.41 //
GV05agsas_4u:473: viparyāsādavivekato yathā jāgrajjāgarite 'cintyānbhāvānaśakyacintanīyān rajjusarpādīn bhūtavatparamārthavatspṛśanniva vikalpayedityarthaḥ kaścidyathā,
GV05agsas_4u:479: jātis tu deśitā buddhair ajātes trasatāṃ sadā // MandUpK_4.42 //
GV05agsas_4u:485: tābhyāṃ hetubhyāmastivastutvavādinām asti vastubhūva ityevaṃ vadanaśīlānāṃ dṛḍhāgrahavatāṃ śraddadhānānāṃ mandavivekināmanarthepāyatvena sā deśitā jātiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:487: vedāntābhyāsināṃ tu svayamevājādvayātmaviṣayo viveko bhaviṣyatīti na tu paramārthabuddhyā /
GV05agsas_4u:488: te hi śrotriyāḥ sthūlabuddhitvādajāter ajātivastunaḥ sadā trasyantyātmanāśaṃ manyamānā avivekina ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:492: ajātes trasatāṃ teṣām upalambhād viyanti ye /
GV05agsas_4u:493: jātidoṣā na setsyanti doṣo 'py alpo bhaviṣyati // MandUpK_4.43 //
GV05agsas_4u:496: ye caivamupalambhātsamācarāccājāterajātivastunastrasanto 'stivastvityadvayādātmano viyanti viruddhaṃ yanti dvaitaṃ pratipadyanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:497: teṣāmajātestrasatāṃ śraddhadhānānāṃ sanmārgāvalambināṃ jātidoṣā jātyupalambhakṛtā doṣā na setsyanti siddhiṃ nopayāsyanti,
GV05agsas_4u:503: nanūpalambhasamācārayoḥ pramāṇatvādastyeva dvaitaṃ vastviti, na; upalambhasamācārayorvyabhicārāt /
GV05agsas_4u:506: upalambhāt samācārād asti vastu tathocyate // MandUpK_4.44 //
GV05agsas_4u:509: upalabhyate hi māyāhastī hastīva hastinamivātra samācaranti,
GV05agsas_4u:514: kiṃ punaḥ paramārthasadvastu yadāspadā jātyāhyasadbuddhaya ityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:516: ajācalam avastutvaṃ vijñānaṃ śāntam advayam // MandUpK_4.45 //
GV05agsas_4u:523: vastvābhāsaṃ vastu dravyaṃ dharmi tadvadavabhāsata iti vastvābhāsam /
GV05agsas_4u:524: yathā sa eva devadatto gauro dīrgha iti jāyate devadattaḥ spandate dīrgho gaura ityevamavabhāsate /
GV05agsas_4u:530: evaṃ na jāyate cittam evaṃ dharmā ajāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:531: evam eva vijānanto na patanti viparyaye // MandUpK_4.46 //
GV05agsas_4u:534: evaṃ yathoktebhyo hetubhyo na jāyate cittamevaṃ dharmā ātmano 'jāḥ smṛtā brahmavidbhiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:536: evameva yathoktaṃ vijñānaṃ jātyādirahitamadvayamātmatattvaṃ vijānantastyaktabāhyaiṣaṇāḥ punarnapatantyavidyādhvāntasāgare viparyaye /
GV05agsas_4u:537: “tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ” (ī.u.7) ityādi mantravarṇāt //46//
GV05agsas_4u:545: yathā hi loka ṛjuvakrādiprakārābhāsamalātaspanditamulkācalanaṃ tathā grahaṇagrāhakābhāsaṃ viṣayiviṣayābhāsamityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:553: aspandamānaṃ vijñānam anābhāsam ajaṃ tathā // MandUpK_4.48 //
GV05agsas_4u:561: alāte spandamāne vai nābhāsā anyato bhuvaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:562: na tato 'nyatra nispandān nālātaṃ praviśanti te // MandUpK_4.49 //
GV05agsas_4u:565: tasminnevālāte spandamāna ṛjuvakrādyābhāsā alātādanyataḥ kutaścidāgatyālāte naiva bhavantī7ti nānyatobhuvaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:575: na nirgatā alātātta ābhāsā gṛhādivaddravyatvābhāvayogato dravyasyabhāvo dravyatvam,
GV05agsas_4u:584: na tato 'nyatra nispandān na vijñānaṃ viśanti te // MandUpK_4.51 //
GV05agsas_4u:593: yathāsatsvṛjvādyābhāseṣv ṛjvādibuddhirdṛṣṭālātamātre tathāstveva jātyādiṣu vijñānamātre jātyādibuddhirmṛṣaiveti samudāyārthaḥ //51-52 //
GV05agsas_4u:596: ajamekamātmatattvamiti sthitaṃ tatra yairapi kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kalpyate teṣām /
GV05agsas_4u:597: dravyaṃ dravyasya hetuḥ syād anyad anyasya caiva hi /
GV05agsas_4u:598: dravyatvam anyabhāvo vā dharmāṇāṃ nopapadyate // MandUpK_4.53 //
GV05agsas_4u:601: dravyaṃ dravyasyānyasyānyaddhetuḥ kāraṇaṃ syānna tu tasyaiva tat /
GV05agsas_4u:603: na ca dravyatvaṃ dharmāṇāmātmānāmupapadyate 'nyatvaṃ vā kutaścidyenānyasya kāraṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ vā pratipadyate /
GV05agsas_4u:607: evaṃ na cittajā dharmāś cittaṃ vāpi na dharmajam /
GV05agsas_4u:611: evaṃ yathoktebhyo hetubhya ātmavijñānasvarūpameva cittamiti na cittajā bāhyadharmā nāpi bāhyadharmajaṃ cittam /
GV05agsas_4u:613: evaṃ na hetoḥ phalaṃ jāyate nāpi phalāddheturiti hetuphalayorajātiṃ hetuphalājātiṃ praviśantyadhyavasyanty ātmani hetuphalayorabhāvameva pratipadyante brahmavida ityarthaḥ //54//
GV05agsas_4u:616: ye punarhetuphalayorabhiniviṣṭāsteṣāṃ kiṃ syādityucyate- dharmādharmākhyasya hetorahaṃ kartā mama dharmādharmau tatphalaṃ kālāntare kvacitprāṇinikāye jāto bhokṣya iti-
GV05agsas_4u:623: yadā punarmantrauṣadhivīryeṇeva grahāveśo yathoktādvaitadaśanenāvidyodbhūtahetuphalāveśo 'panīto bhavati tadā tasminkṣīṇe nāsti hetuphalodbhavaḥ //55//
GV05agsas_4u:628: kṣīṇe hetuphalāveśe saṃsāraṃ na prapadyate // MandUpK_4.56 //
GV05agsas_4u:631: yāvatsamyagdarśanena hetuphalāveśo na nivartate 'kṣīṇaḥ saṃsārastāvadāyato dīrgho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:632: kṣīṇe punarhetiphalāveśe saṃsāraṃ na prapadyate kāraṇābhāvāt //56//
GV05agsas_4u:635: nanvajādātmano 'nyannāstyeva tatkathaṃ hetuphalayoḥ saṃsārasya cotpattivināśāvucyete tvayā?
GV05agsas_4u:637: saṃvṛtyā jāyate sarvaṃ śāśvataṃ nāsti tena vai /
GV05agsas_4u:638: sadbhāvena hy ajaṃ sarvam ucchedas tena nāsti vai // MandUpK_4.57 //
GV05agsas_4u:641: saṃvṛtyā saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvṛtiravidyāviṣayo laukiko vyavahārastā saṃvṛtyā jāyate sarvam /
GV05agsas_4u:648: dharmā ya iti jāyante jāyante te na tattvataḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:649: janma māyopamaṃ teṣāṃ sā ca māyā na vidyate // MandUpK_4.58 //
GV05agsas_4u:652: ye 'pyātmāno 'nye ca dharmā jāyanta iti kalpyante ta ityevaṃ prakārā yathoktā saṃvṛtinirdiśyata iti saṃvṛtyaiva dharmā jāyante;
GV05agsas_4u:654: yatpunastatsaṃvṛtyā janma teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathoktānāṃ yathā māyayā janma tathā tanmāyopamaṃ pratyetavyam /
GV05agsas_4u:655: māyā nāma vastu tarhi? naivam; sā ca māyā na vidyate, māyetyavidyamānasyākhyetyabhiprāyaḥ //58//
GV05agsas_4u:660: nāsau nityo na cocchedī tadvad dharmeṣu yojanā // MandUpK_4.59 //
GV05agsas_4u:663_0: yathā māyāmayādbījājjāyate tanmayo māyāmayo 'ṅkuro nāsāṅkuro nityo na cocchedī vināśī
GV05agsas_4u:663_1: vābhūtatvāttadvadeva dharmeṣu janmanāśādiyojanā yuktir na tu paramārthato dharmāṇāṃ
GV05agsas_4u:667: yatra varṇā na vartante vivekas tatra nocyate // MandUpK_4.60 //
GV05agsas_4u:670: paramārthatastvātmasvajeṣu nityaikarasavijñaptimātrasattākeṣu śāśvato 'śāśvata ita vā nābhidhā nābhidhānaṃ pravartata ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:671: yatra yeṣu varṇyante yairarthāste varṇāṃ śabdā na pravartante 'bhidhātuṃ prakāśayituṃ na pravartanta ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:672: idamevamiti viveko viviktatā tatra nityo 'nitya iti nocyate /
GV05agsas_4u:676: yathā svapne dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ calati māyayā /
GV05agsas_4u:677: tathā jāgrad dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ calati māyayā // MandUpK_4.61 //
GV05agsas_4u:678: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ cittaṃ svapne na saṃśayaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:679: advayaṃ ca dvayābhāsaṃ tathā jāgran na saṃśayaḥ // MandUpK_4.62 //
GV05agsas_4u:682: yatpunarvāggocaratvaṃ paramārthato 'dvayasya vijñānamātrasya tanmanasaḥ spandanamātraṃ na paramārthata iti /
GV05agsas_4u:687: svapnadṛk pracaran svapne dikṣu vai daśasu sthitān /
GV05agsas_4u:688: aṇḍajān svedajān vāpi jīvān paśyati yān sadā // MandUpK_4.63 //
GV05agsas_4u:691: svapnānpaśyatīti svapnadṛkpracaranparyaṭansvapne svapnasthāne dikṣu vai daśasu sthitānvartamānāñjīvānprāṇino 'ṇḍajānsvedajānvā yānsadā paśyati //63//
GV05agsas_4u:695: svapnadṛkcittadṛśyās te na vidyante tataḥ pṛthak /
GV05agsas_4u:696: tathā tad dṛśyam evedaṃ svapnadṛkcittam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.64 //
GV05agsas_4u:699: svapnadṛśaścittaṃ svapnadṛkcittaṃ tena dṛśyāste jīvāstatastasmātsvapnadṛkcittātpṛthaṅna vidyante na santītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:701: tathā tadapi svapnadṛkcittamidaṃ taddṛśyameva, tena svapnadṛśā dṛśyaṃ taddṛśyam /
GV05agsas_4u:705: carañ jāgarite jāgrad dikṣu vai daśasu sthitān /
GV05agsas_4u:706: aṇḍajān svedajān vāpi jīvān paśyati yān sadā // MandUpK_4.65 //
GV05agsas_4u:707: jāgrac cittekṣaṇīyās te na vidyante tataḥ pṛthak /
GV05agsas_4u:708: tathā tad dṛśyam evedaṃ jāgrataś cittam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.66 //
GV05agsas_4u:716: ubhe hy anyonyadṛśye te kiṃ tad astīti cocyate /
GV05agsas_4u:717: lakṣaṇāśūnyam ubhayaṃ tan mate naiva gṛhyate // MandUpK_4.67 //
GV05agsas_4u:724: tasmānna kiñcidastīti cocyate cittaṃ vā cittekṣaṇīyaṃ vā kiṃ tadastīti vivekinocyate /
GV05agsas_4u:725: na hi svapne hastī hasticittaṃ vā vidyate tathehāpi vivekināmityabhiprāyaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:727: lakṣaṇāśūnyaṃ lakṣyate 'nayeti lakṣaṇā pramāṇaṃ pramāṇaśūnyamubhayaṃ cittaṃ caityaṃ dvayaṃ yatastanmatenaiva taccittatayaiva tadgṛhyate /
GV05agsas_4u:728: na hi ghaṭamatiṃ pratyākhyāya ghaṭo gṛhyate nāpi ghaṭaṃ pratyākhyāya ghaṭamatiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:729: na hi tatra pramāṇaprameyabhedaḥ śakyate kalpayitumityabhiprāyaḥ //67//
GV05agsas_4u:732: yathā svapnamayo jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05agsas_4u:733: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.68 //
GV05agsas_4u:734: yathā māyāmayo jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05agsas_4u:735: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.69 //
GV05agsas_4u:736: yathā nirmitako jīvo jāyate mriyate 'pi ca /
GV05agsas_4u:737: tathā jīvā amī sarve bhavanti na bhavanti ca // MandUpK_4.70 //
GV05agsas_4u:740: māyāmayo māyāvinā yaḥ kṛto nirmitako mantrauṣadhyādibhirniṣpāditaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:741: svapnamāyānirmitakā aṇḍajātayo jīvā yatā jāyante mriyante ca tachā manuṣyādilakṣaṇā avidyamānā eva citta vikalpanāmātrā ityartaḥ //68-70 //
GV05agsas_4u:744: na kaścij jāyate jīvaḥ saṃbhavo 'sya na vidyate /
GV05agsas_4u:745: etat tad uttamaṃ satyaṃ yatra kiñcin na jāyate // MandUpK_4.71 //
GV05agsas_4u:749: uttamaṃ tu paramārthasatyaṃ na kaścijjāyate jīva iti /
GV05agsas_4u:754: cittaṃ nirviṣayaṃ nityam asaṅgaṃ tena kīrtitam // MandUpK_4.72 //
GV05agsas_4u:757: sarvaṃ grāhyagrāhakavaccittaspanditameva dvayaṃ cittaṃ paramārthata ātmaiveti nirviṣayaṃ tena nirviṣayatvena nityamasaṅgaṃ kīrtitam /
GV05agsas_4u:763: nanu nirviṣayatvena cedasaṅgatvaṃ cittasya na niḥsaṅgatā bhavati yasmācchāstā śāstraṃ śiṣyaścetyevamāderviṣayasya vidyamānatvāt /
GV05agsas_4u:770: kalpitā ca sā paramārthapratipatyupāyatvena saṃvṛtiśca sā,
GV05agsas_4u:771: tayā yo 'sti paramārthena nāstyasau na vidyate /
GV05agsas_4u:773: yaśca paratantrābhisaṃvṛtyā paraśāstravyavahāreṇa syātpadārthaḥ sa paramārthato nirūpyamāṇo nāstyeva /
GV05agsas_4u:777: nanu śāstrādīnāṃ saṃvṛtitve 'ja itīyamapi kalpanāṃ saṃvṛtiḥ syāt?
GV05agsas_4u:780: paratantrādiniṣpattyā saṃvṛtyā jāyate tu saḥ // MandUpK_4.74 //
GV05agsas_4u:784: paramārthena nāpyajo yasmātparatantrābhiniṣpattyā paraśāstrasiddhimapekṣya yo 'ja ityuktaḥ sa saṃvṛtyā jāyate /
GV05agsas_4u:785: ato 'ja itīyamapi kalpanā paramārthaviṣaye naiva kramata ityarthaḥ //74//
GV05agsas_4u:790: dvayābhāvaṃ sa buddhvaiva nirnimitto na jāyate // MandUpK_4.75 //
GV05agsas_4u:796: mithyābhiniveśamātraṃ ca janmanaḥ kāraṇaṃ yasmāttasmāddvayābhāvaṃ buddhvā nirnimitto nivṛttamithyādvayābhiniveśo yaḥ sa na jāyate //75//
GV05agsas_4u:800: tadā na jāyate cittaṃ hetvabhāve phalaṃ kutaḥ // MandUpK_4.76 //
GV05agsas_4u:803: jātyāśramavihitā aśīrvarjitairanuṣṭhīyamānā dharmā devatvādiprāptihetava uttamāḥ kevalāśca dharmāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:806_1: jānanna labhate na paśyati yathā bālairdṛśyamānaṃ gagane malaṃ vivekī na paśyati
GV05agsas_4u:806_3: na hyasati hetau phalamutpadyate bījādyabhāva iva sasyādi //76 //
GV05agsas_4u:812: ajātasyaiva sarvasya cittadṛśyaṃ hi tadyataḥ // MandUpK_4.77 //
GV05agsas_4u:815: paramārthadarśanena nirastadharmādharmākhyotpattinimittasyānimittasya cittasyeti yā mokṣākhyānutpattiḥ sā sarvadā sarvāvasthāsu samā nirviśeṣādvayā ca /
GV05agsas_4u:817: yasmātprāgapu vijñānāccittadṛśyaṃ tadadvayaṃ janma ca tasmādajātasya sarvasya sarvadā cittasya samādvayaivānutpattirna punaḥ kadācidbhavati kadācidvā na bhavati /
GV05agsas_4u:822: buddhvā nimittatāṃ satyāṃ hetuṃ pṛthag anāpnuvan /
GV05agsas_4u:823: vītaśokaṃ tathākāmam abhayaṃ padam aśnute // MandUpK_4.78 //
GV05agsas_4u:826_0: animittatāṃ ca satyāṃ paramārtharūpāṃ buddhvā hetuṃ dharmādikāraṇaṃ devādiyoniprāptaye
GV05agsas_4u:830: vastvabhāvaṃ sa budhvaiva niḥsaṅgaṃ vinivartate // MandUpK_4.79 //
GV05agsas_4u:833: yasmād bhūtābhiniveśādasati dvaye dvayāstitvaniścayo 'bhūtābhiniveśastasmādavidyāvyāmoharūpāddhi sadṛśe tadanurūpe taccittaṃ pravartate /
GV05agsas_4u:834: tasya dvayasya vastuno 'bhāvaṃ yadā buddhavāṃstadā tasmānniḥsaṅgo nirapekṣaṃ sadvinivartate 'bhūtābhiniveśaviṣayāt //79//
GV05agsas_4u:838: viṣayaḥ sa hi buddhānāṃ tat sāmyam ajam advayam // MandUpK_4.80 //
GV05agsas_4u:841: nivṛtasya dvaitaviṣayādviṣayāntare cāpravṛttasyābhāvadarśanena cittasya niścalā calanavarjitā brahmasvarūpaiva tadā sthitiḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:843: sa hi yasmādviṣayo gocaraḥ paramārthadarśināṃ buddhānāṃ tasmāttatsāmyaṃ paraṃ nirviśeṣamajamadvayaṃ ca //80//
GV05agsas_4u:847: ajam anidram asvapnaṃ prabhātaṃ bhavati svayam /
GV05agsas_4u:848: sakṛdvibhāto hy evaiṣa dharma dhātusvabhāvataḥ // MandUpK_4.81 //
GV05agsas_4u:851: svayameva tatprabhātaṃ bhavati, nādityapādyapekṣam; syayañjyotiḥ svabhāvamityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:852: sakṛdvibhātaḥ sadaiva vibhāta ityetadeṣa evaṃlakṣaṇa ātmākhyo dharmo dhātusvabhāvato vastusvabhāvata ityarthaḥ //81//
GV05agsas_4u:856: sukham āvriyate nityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vivriyate sadā /
GV05agsas_4u:857: yasya kasya ca dharmasya graheṇa bhagavān asau // MandUpK_4.82 //
GV05agsas_4u:860: yasmādyasya kasyaciddvayavastuno dharmasya graheṇa grahaṇāveśena mithyābhiniviṣṭatayā sukhamāvriyate 'nāyāsenācchādyata ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:862: duḥkhaṃ ca vivriyate prakaṭīkriyate, paramārthajñānasya durlabhatvāt /
GV05agsas_4u:864: ato vedāntairācāryaiśca bahuśa ucyamāno 'pi naiva jñātuṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:868: asti nāstītyādisūkṣmaviṣayā api paṇḍitānāṃ grahā bhagavataḥ paramātmana āvaraṇa eva kimuta mūḍhajanānāṃ buddhilakṣaṇā ityevamarthaṃ pradarśayannāha-
GV05agsas_4u:869: asti nāsty asti nāstīti nāsti nāstīti vā punaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:879: prakāracatuṣṭayasyāpi tairataiścalisthirobhayābhāvaiḥ sadasadādivādī sarvo 'pi bhagavantamāvṛṇotyeva bāliśo 'vivekī /
GV05agsas_4u:880: yadyapi paṇḍito bāliśa eva paramārthatattvānavabodhāckimu svabhāvamūḍho jana ityabhiprāyaḥ //83//
GV05agsas_4u:884: koṭhyaś catasra etās tu grahair yāsāṃ sadā vṛtaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:885: bhagavān ābhir aspṛṣṭo yena dṛṣṭaḥ sa sarvadṛk // MandUpK_4.84 //
GV05agsas_4u:888_0: koṭhyaḥ prāvādukaśāstranirṇayāntā etā uktā asti nāstītyādyāścatasro yāsāṃ koṭīnāṃ
GV05agsas_4u:888_3: ityetadyena muninā dṛṣṭo jñāto vedānteṣvaupaniṣadaḥ puruṣaḥ sa sarvadṛksarvajñaḥ
GV05agsas_4u:891: prāpya sarvajñatāṃ kṛtsnāṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ padam advayam /
GV05agsas_4u:892: anāpannādimadhyāntaṃ kim ataḥ param īhate // MandUpK_4.85 //
GV05agsas_4u:895: prāpyaitāṃ yathoktāṃ kṛtsnāṃ samastāṃ sarvajñatāṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ padaṃ“sa brāhmaṇaḥ“(bṛ.u.3 / 8 / 10)
GV05agsas_4u:898: ādimadhyāntā utpattisthitilayā anāpannā aprāptā yasyādvayasya padasya na vidyante tadanāpannādimadhyāntaṃ brāhmaṇyaṃ padam,
GV05agsas_4u:899: tadeva prāpya labdhvā kimataḥ paramasmādātmalābhādūrdhvamīhate ceṣṭate niṣprayojanamityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:903: viprāṇāṃ vinayo hy eṣa śamaḥ prākṛta ucyate /
GV05agsas_4u:904: damaḥ prakṛtidāntatvād evaṃ vidvāñ śamaṃ vrajet // MandUpK_4.86 //
GV05agsas_4u:907: viprāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vinayo vinītatvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ yadetātmasvarūpeṇāvasthānam /
GV05agsas_4u:908: eṣa vinayaḥ śamo 'pyeṣa eva prākṛtaḥ svābhāviko 'kṛtaka ucyate /
GV05agsas_4u:910: evaṃ yathoktaṃ svabhāvopaśāntaṃ brahma vidvāñśamamupaśāntiṃ svābhāvikīṃ brahmasvarūpāṃ vrajed brahmasvarūpeṇāvatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ //86//
GV05agsas_4u:914: ato mithyādarśanāni tānīti tadyuktibhireva darśayitvā catuṣkoṭivarjitatvādrāhādidoṣānāspadaṃ svabhāvaśāntamadvaitadarśanameva samyagdarśamityupasaṃhṛtam /
GV05agsas_4u:916: savastu sopalambhaṃ ca dvayaṃ laukikam iṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:917: avastu sopalambhaṃ ca śuddhaṃ laukikam iṣyate // MandUpK_4.87 //
GV05agsas_4u:920: savastu saṃvṛtisatā vastunā saha vartata iti savastu,
GV05agsas_4u:921: tathā copalabdhirupalambhastena saha vartata iti sopalbhaṃ ca śāstrādisarvavyavahārāspadaṃ grāhyagrāhakalakṣaṇaṃ dvayaṃ laukikaṃ lokādanapetaṃ lokikaṃ jāgaritamityetat /
GV05agsas_4u:924: sopalambhaṃ vastuvadupalambhanamupalambho 'satyapi vastuni tena saha vartata iti sopalambhaṃ ca /
GV05agsas_4u:925: śuddhaṃ kevalaṃ pravibhaktaṃ jāgaritātsthūlāllaukikaṃ sarvaprāṇisādhāraṇatvādiṣyate svapna ityarthaḥ //87//
GV05agsas_4u:928: avastv anupalambhaṃ ca lokottaram iti smṛtam /
GV05agsas_4u:929: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca vijñeyaṃ sadā buddhaiḥ prakīrtitam // MandUpK_4.88 //
GV05agsas_4u:932: avastvanupalambhaṃ ca grāhyagrahaṇavarjitamityetat, lokottaram ata eva lokātītam /
GV05agsas_4u:934: sopāyaṃ paramārthatattvaṃ laukikaṃ śuddhalaukikaṃ lokottaraṃ ca krameṇa yena jñānena jñāyate tajjñānam /
GV05agsas_4u:941: jñāne ca trividhe jñeye krameṇa vidite svayam /
GV05agsas_4u:942: sarvajñatā hi sarvatra bhavatīha mahādhiyaḥ // MandUpK_4.89 //
GV05agsas_4u:946: jñeye ca laukikādau trividhe- pūrvaṃ laukikaṃ sthūlam,
GV05agsas_4u:948_0: tathābhāvena lokottaramityevaṃ krameṇa sthānatrayābhāvena paramārthasatye turye 'dvaye
GV05agsas_4u:948_1: 'je 'bhaye vidite svayamevātmasvarūpameva sarvajñatā sarvaścāsau jñaśca sarvajñastadbhāvaḥ sarvajñatā,
GV05agsas_4u:952: na hi paramārthavido jñānodbhavābhibhavau sto yathānyeṣāṃ prāvādukānām //89//
GV05agsas_4u:955: laukikādīnāṃ krameṇa jñeyatvena nirdeśādastitvāśaṅkā paramārthato mā bhūdityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:957: teṣām anyatra vijñeyād upalambhas triṣu smṛtaḥ // MandUpK_4.90 //
GV05agsas_4u:960: heyāni ca laukikādīni trīṇi jāgaritasvapnasuṣuptānyātmanyasattvena rajjvāṃ sarpavaddhātavyānītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:964: sarvāṇyetāni heyajñeyāpyapākyāni vijñeyāni bhikṣuṇopāyatvenetyarthaḥ, agrayāṇātaḥ prathamataḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:965: teṣāṃ heyādīnāmanyatra vijñeyātparamārthasatyaṃ vijñeyaṃ brahmaikaṃ varjayitvā,
GV05agsas_4u:967: heyāpyāpakyeṣu triṣvapi smṛto brahmavidbhirna paramārthasatyatā trayāṇāmityarthaḥ //90//
GV05agsas_4u:972: vidyate na hi nānātvaṃ teṣāṃ kvacana kiñcanaḥ // MandUpK_4.91 //
GV05agsas_4u:975: prakṛtyā svabhāvata ākāśavadākāśatulyāḥ sūkṣmanirañjanasarvagatatvaiḥ sarve dharmā ātmāno jñeyāṃ mumukṣubhiranādayo nityāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:976: bahuvacanakṛtabhedāśaṅkāṃ nirākurvannāha- kvacana kiñcana kindidaṇumātramapi teṣāṃ na vidyate nānātvamiti //91//
GV05agsas_4u:979: jñeyatāpi dharmāṇāṃ saṃvṛtyaiva na paramārthata ityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:981: yasyaivaṃ bhavati kṣāntiḥ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // MandUpK_4.92 //
GV05agsas_4u:984: yasmādādau buddhā ādibuddhāḥ prakṛtyaiva svabhāvata eva yathā nityaprakāśasvarūpaḥ savitaivaṃ nityabodhasvarūpā ityarthaḥ sarve dharmāḥ sarva ātmānaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:985: na ca teṣāṃ niścayaḥ kartavyo nityaniścitasvarūpā ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:987_0: yasya mumukṣorevaṃ yathoktaprakāreṇa sarvadā bodhaniścayanirapekṣatātmārthaṃ parārthaṃ
GV05agsas_4u:987_1: vā yathā savitā nityaṃ prakāśāntaranirapekṣaḥ svārthaṃ paramārthaṃ cetyevaṃ bhavati
GV05agsas_4u:987_2: kṣāntirbodhakartavyatānirapekṣatā sarvadā svātmani sa amṛtatvāyāmṛtabhāvāya kalpate
GV05agsas_4u:992: sarve dharmāḥ samābhinnā ajaṃ sāmyaṃ viśāradam // MandUpK_4.93 //
GV05agsas_4u:995: yasmādādiśāntā nityameva śāntā anutpannā ajāśca prakṛtyaiva sunirvṛtāḥ suṣṭhūparatasvabhāvā ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:997: ajaṃ sāmyaṃ viśāradaṃ viśuddhamātmatatvaṃ yasmāttasmācchāntirmokṣo vā nāsti kartavya ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1001: ye yathoktaṃ paramārthatattvaṃ pratipannāsta evākṛpaṇā loke kṛpaṇā evānya ityāha-
GV05agsas_4u:1002: vaiśāradyaṃ tu vai nāsti bhede vicaratāṃ sadā /
GV05agsas_4u:1003: bhedanimnāḥ pṛthagvādās tasmāt te kṛpaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_4.94 //
GV05agsas_4u:1007: pṛdagvādāḥ pṛthaṅnānā vastvityevaṃ vadanaṃ yeṣāṃ te pṛthagvādā dvaitina ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1009: yasmādvaiśāradyaṃ viśuddhirnāsti teṣāṃ bhede vicaratāṃ dvaitamārge 'vidyākalpite sarvadā vartamānānāmityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1014: aje sāmye tu ye kecid bhaviṣyanti suniścitāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1015: te hi loke mahājñānās tac ca loko na gāhate // MandUpK_4.95 //
GV05agsas_4u:1018: aje sāmye paramārthatattva evameveti ye kecitstrāyadayo 'pi suniścitā bhaviṣyanti cetta eva hi loke mahājñānā niratiśaya tattvaviṣayajñānā ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1019: tacca teṣāṃ vartma teṣāṃ viditaṃ paramārthatattvaṃ sāmānyabuddhiranyo loko na gāhate nāvatariti na viṣayīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1026: ajeṣv ajam asaṃkrāntaṃ dharmeṣu jñānam iṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:1027: yato na kramate jñānam asaṅgaṃ tena kīrtitam // MandUpK_4.96 //
GV05agsas_4u:1030: ajeṣvanutpanneṣvacaleṣu dharmeṣvātmasvajamacalaṃ ca jñānamiṣyate savitarīvauṣṇyaṃ prakāśaśca yatastasmādasaṃkrāntamarthāntare jñānamajamiṣyate /
GV05agsas_4u:1031: yasmānna kramater'thāntare jñānaṃ tena kāraṇenāsaṅgaṃ tatkīrtitamākāśakalpamityuktam //96//
GV05agsas_4u:1038_0: ito 'nyeṣāṃ vādināmaṇumātre 'pi vaidharmye vastuni bahirantarvā jāyamāna utpādyamāne
GV05agsas_4u:1038_1: 'vipaścito 'vivekino 'saṅgatā asaṅgatvaṃ sadā nāsti kimuta vaktayavyamāvaraṇacyutirbandhanāśo nāstīti //97 //
GV05agsas_4u:1044: ādau buddhās tathā muktā budhyanta iti nāyakāḥ // MandUpK_4.98 //
GV05agsas_4u:1047: alabdhāvaraṇāḥ- alabdhamaprāptamāvaraṇamavidyādibandhanaṃ yeṣāṃ te dharmā alabdhāvaraṇā bandhanarahitā ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1048: prakṛtinirmalāḥ svabhāvaśuddhā ādau buddhāstathā muktā yasmānnityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvāḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1050: nāyakāḥ svāminaḥ samarthā boddhuṃ bodhaśaktimatsvabhāvā ityarthaḥ,
GV05agsas_4u:1051: yathā nityaprakāśasvarūpo 'pi savitā prakāśata ityucyate yathā vā nityanivṛttagatayo 'pi nityameva śailāstiṣṭhantītyucyate tadvat //98//
GV05agsas_4u:1054: kramate na hi buddhasya jñānaṃ dharmeṣu tāyinaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1055: sarve dharmās tathā jñānaṃ naitad buddhena bhāṣitam // MandUpK_4.99 //
GV05agsas_4u:1058: yasmānna hi kramate buddhasya paramārthadarśino jñānaṃ viṣayāntareṣu dharmeṣu dharmasaṃsthaṃ savitarīva prabhā,
GV05agsas_4u:1062: sarve dharmā ātmāno 'pi tathā jñānavadevākāśakalpatvānna kramante kvacidapyarthāntara ityarthaḥ /
GV05agsas_4u:1063: yadādāvupanyastaṃ jñānenākāśakalpenetyādi tadidamākāśakalpasya tāyino buddhasya tadananyatvādākāśakalpaṃ jñānaṃ na kramaye kvacidapyarthāntare /
GV05agsas_4u:1074: buddhvā padam anānātvaṃ namaskurmo yathābalam // MandUpK_4.100 //
GV05agsas_4u:1080: ajaṃ sāmyaṃ viśāradam īdṛkpadamanānātvaṃ nānātvavarjitaṃ buddhvāvagamya tadbhūtāḥ santo namaskurmastasmai padāya,
GV05agsas_4u:1082: iti śaṅkarabhagavataḥ kṛtau gauḍapādīyāgamaśāstravivaraṇe 'lātaśāntyākhyaṃ caturthaṃ prakaraṇam //
